name: Shishki Branding Agency
description:
Shishki is a courageous and dedicated studio branding agency that hails from St. Petersburg, Russia. We are a team of young creatives with a passion for people and ideas igniting them. Using an unconventional approach, we assist brands and entrepreneurs in visualising ideas, introducing people to new products and services through linking them all together. We suggest optimal ways to reach target client groups by empowering your brand identity.
— Brand and corporate identity creation: fresh, positive, attractive, worth recalling and sharing.
— By implying strategy as one of our services we provide you with clear and wholesome instructions on further development of your brand.
— Consult international companies aiming to work on Russian market and provide related services: brand strategy, design, web, advertising and legal support.
Our portfolio in English: https://www.behance.net/shishkipro
